title: Cap Streamers, ca. 1730
medium:
Medium: linen 
Technique: bobbin lace, Brussels style
creditline: Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf Esq. in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Pair of cap streamers in a design arranged around a series of diamond shapes, over and between which curves delicate floral designs. Smaller floral motifs fill square frames. Scalloped edges and ends.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cap Streamers, ca. 1730.
ca. 1730. Medium: linen
